ValidationRule.description: Validate if all fields of the First Period are set to activate record
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( IsActive, ISPICKVAL(Product2.Family, "Parking"), OR( ISBLANK(COMM_FirstPeriodStartDay__c), ISBLANK(COMM_FirstPeriodEndDay__c), ISBLANK(COMM_FirstPeriodDailyMaximum__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To set as active, all First Period fields are required
